hackku-2024.customHeaderHTML: <small>For the unfamiliar, the "hack" in "hackathon" refers to the incomplete, duck-taped mess that results from writing so much code during such a small time window. It is different from the "hack" which refers to maliciously infiltrating someone else's computer system.</small>
